顂字的基本解释

顂
lài
古同“赖”：“顂为如来亲加被，还同枯木再生春。”

顂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lài］
［《玉篇》力載切］
(1)同“賴”。一说“賴”之讹字。
(2)春秋时郑地名。
[②]［lái］
［《集韻》郎才切，平咍，來。］
头长貌。

顂字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　顂； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1405第33
【玉篇】力載切，音賴。顂蒙也。　又【集韻】郞才切，音來。顂?，頭長貌。　【正字通】賴字之譌。

顂字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
顂字的起名意思

暂无。

Fang
Basic explanation of words
Fang
lài
Ancient Tong "Lai": "Fang is the Tathagata's pro-quilt, and it regenerates spring with dead wood."
Fang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lài］
["Jade Pian" forcefully cut]
(1) Same as "Lai". One said that "Lai" is an error.
(2) The place names of Zheng in the Spring and Autumn Period.
[②]［lái］
["Jiyun" Lang Cai cut, flat 咍, come. ]
The head looks long.
Fang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　顂; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1405 Page 33
[Jade articles] Force load cut, sound Lai. Fang Meng also.　[Jiyun] Yun Cai cut, the sound comes. Fang?, the head looks long.　【Zhengzitong】Laizizhizhi.
Fang
